column4: Alright, imma start from the beginning, i did a do-release-upgrade, from lucid, and now I'm not sure what i need to fix / how because i can get into grub, but not into the system...  & /me is not too grub-savvy.
if someone could help, i'd be indebted
this is my xbmc... i can't go without music or TV!
you probably need to blacklist the module
then sudo [insert your editor of choice] blacklist.conf
